```{r}
library(tidyverse)
Titanic %>% 
  data.frame() %>%
  uncount(weights = Freq) ->
titanic
  
ggcanvas() +
  stamp_point(xy = pos_wrap(n = 2201, ncol = 40),
              size = .5,
              color = ifelse(titanic$Sex == "Male", "blue", "green"),
              alpha = ifelse(titanic$Survived == "Yes", 1, .4))  
  
Titanic %>% 
  data.frame() %>% 
  filter(Freq != 0) %>% 
  filter(Class == "3rd")
```
